name: Aqua Transforms
description:
In this game you need to take all checkpoints to complete the levels. Playable character is water clot with ability change the state of aggregation. This feature helps to get to previously inaccessible places. Also it may be useful to avoid obstacles, which cause damage only certain states of water. For example, spikes may destroy the ice, fan dispel steam, etc. There are small puzzle elements.

    Controls:

movements - 'a','d' or 'arrow keys'

jump - 'w' or 'up'
